survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate the effectiveness of corporate training programs, identifying strengths and areas for improvement to enhance employee learning experiences and outcomes.

questions.question_text: How often do you participate in corporate training programs?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice response to gauge frequency of participation.

script.question_text: How often do you participate in corporate training programs?

questions.question_text: Which types of training programs have you participated in? (Select all that apply)
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who answered 'Monthly', 'Quarterly', 'Biannually', or 'Annually' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to identify the variety of training programs attended.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: Checkbox with an 'Other' option as open text

script.question_text: Which types of training programs have you participated in? (Select all that apply)
script.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who answered 'Monthly', 'Quarterly', 'Biannually', or 'Annually' to Q1

questions.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how would you rate the relevance of the training content to your job role? (1 = Not relevant, 5 = Highly relevant)
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who answered 'Monthly', 'Quarterly', 'Biannually', or 'Annually' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a Likert scale to measure perceived relevance.

script.question_text: On a scale of 1-5, how would you rate the relevance of the training content to your job role? (1 = Not relevant, 5 = Highly relevant)
script.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who answered 'Monthly', 'Quarterly', 'Biannually', or 'Annually' to Q1

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future training programs?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to gather qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for future training programs?

questions.question_text: How has participating in corporate training programs impacted your job performance?
questions.routing_logic: Appears for respondents who answered 'Monthly', 'Quarterly', 'Biannually', or 'Annually' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Single-choice question to assess perceived impact on performance.
